definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: According to Alice Hibberd film adapted from a best-selling novel.
sentences.chinese: 本片根据爱丽丝希伯德的畅销小说改编而成。

sentences.english: The article analyzes the process and difference of Rashomon from three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分简析“罗生门”的历史改编过程。

sentences.english: According to Xie Wanglin's best-selling novel, based on the reality.
sentences.chinese: 根据谢旺霖同名畅销小说改编，真人真事为蓝本。

sentences.english: Only the Kalobaw strategic command refuses to accept BGF.
sentences.chinese: 只有卡洛堡前线司令部拒绝接受改编。

sentences.english: Screenplays can be categorized as original or adapted.
sentences.chinese: 剧本可以分为原创和改编两大类。

sentences.english: It is a fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部根据RMS泰坦尼克号沉没改编的小说。

sentences.english: These children's books are so exciting that they deserve to be adapted into films.
sentences.chinese: 这些儿童图书非常令人激动，值得改编为电影。

sentences.english: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌曲改编为爵士乐后接纳了切分音节拍。

sentences.english: Based on a king Arthur and the sorcerers story.
sentences.chinese: 本剧根据亚瑟王与魔法师梅林的故事改编。

sentences.english: She adapted the novel for movies.
Plot: Straight-to-video adaptation of Oniroku Dan's legendary SM novel.
sentences.chinese: 视频Oniroku丹的传奇小说改编的动向。

sentences.english: The songs were arranged by another well-known bass player.
sentences.chinese: 这些曲子后经另一名著名男低音歌手改编。
那支起义部队被改编了。

sentences.english: The second part discuss the two dramas filmized by Akira Kurosawa.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分就黑泽明对两部影片的改编分别进行讨论。

sentences.english: Modem novelettes have experieced some ups and downs in their adaption into movies.
sentences.chinese: 当代中篇小说和电影改编之间的历史关系几历浮沉。

sentences.english: Video game movie tie-ins have a reputation among players as being some of the worst examples of the medium.
sentences.chinese: 电影改编的电视游戏在玩家中的口碑一直很差。
